name: GlitchGrid
description:
! ! ! READ THIS ! ! !  Highscores/Leaderboard do not work in the browser so if you want to use that feature you should download the desktop version.

I'm working on an Android version to be realased soon, so keep tunned!

This game was made during SalvageJam. It's a remake of my first ever original game.

Original version: martilloveras.me/games/glitch-grid
